lines.text:
* They're bringing in
  something new for study
  today

* We've already documented
  the Rule of Compassion

* The Rule of Self...
  well, most of the team
  couldn't bear it

* But this one-
  The Rule of Order

* ...some of us think it might
  be dangerous to even define

* The Rule of Self...
  it spoke to each of us

* It didn't shout, it didn't
  threaten-it just... asked

* Simple questions, but ones
  that made people doubt their
  own face in the mirror

* Half the team requested
  reassignment. The other
  half...

* Well, they stopped answering
  questions altogether

* That's why I'm worried about
  Order. What if it asks
  the wrong thing?
